home.welcome: Welcome to the Calimero Marketplace Demo!
home.demoDescription: A powerful decentralized marketplace built on Calimero's P2P network. Buy, sell, and manage products with real-time synchronization across the network.
home.calimeroIntro: Calimero is a privacy-focused blockchain network that enables developers to build scalable, private applications. Our platform provides the infrastructure for creating decentralized applications with enhanced privacy and performance.

description.title: Welcome to the Calimero Marketplace Demo
description.subtitle: A decentralized multi-stakeholder marketplace
features: Buy and sell products in a decentralized marketplace
Real-time order tracking and escrow management
Easy-to-use interface for managing your marketplace
description.getStarted: Connect your wallet to get started
